query:
SELECT 
  i.locationId,
  wl.code as locationCode,
  SUM(i.quantity) as totalQuantity,
  SUM(i.reservedQuantity) as totalReserved,
  SUM(i.quantity - i.reservedQuantity) as totalAvailable
FROM inventory i
LEFT JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id
GROUP BY i.locationId, wl.code
HAVING SUM(i.quantity - i.reservedQuantity) < 0
ORDER BY totalAvailable ASC
LIMIT 10;
